text:
hi,
i want to convert an xml to pdf using fop.
for a sample i tried xslforef.xml and xml2pdf.xsl("inside fop\docs").
but using command promt the following fatal error is coming.

commandline entered is " java org.apache.fop.apps.XalanCommandLine xslfoRef.xml 
xml2pdf.xsl xmlfoRef.pdf"

"
using SAX parser org.apache.xerces.parser.SAXParser
transforming to xsl:fo markup
FATAL ERROR: no transformer class found

"

what is the error.
this is my mistake or software mistake.

by
balamurugant

With the latest version the command line has become:

java org.apache.fop.apps.Fop -xml xslforef.xml -xsl xml2pdf.xsl -pdf xmlforef.pdf
creator: Alain.FAGOT@framfab.nl

text:
This error is most likely due to an incorrect classpath.

Fop 0.18.1 includes a runnable fop.jar and all neccessary dependencies in the
lib directory. 

Equivalent command line to Alain's which doesn't require any special classpath:
java -jar fop.jar -xml xslforef.xml -xsl xml2pdf.xsl -pdf xmlforef.pdf
